results.title: Targeting liver stage malaria with metformin.
results.text_hl: An additional effect was observed in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ with a decrease in the numbers of infected hepatocytes. Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ provided in combination with conventional liver- or blood-acting antimalarial drugs further reduced the total burden of @<m>DISEASE_Pneumocystis_Infections</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D016720 @@@P. berghei infection@@@ and substantially lessened disease severity in @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Vera IM, Grilo Ruivo MT, Lemos Rocha LF, Marques S, Bhatia SN, Mota MM, Mancio-Silva L. Targeting liver stage malaria with metformin. JCI Insight. 2019 Dec 19;4(24):. PMID: 31852843
